page.title: 07MORE ABOUT THE SCHOOL
page.content:
The school uses the{Village Hall}for dining and for Physical Education in wet weather.It has its own kitchen where school meals are made.
The school is one of the smallest in North Yorkshire and indeed in the country with only{13}pupils on the register.The numbers have over recent years steadily declined and may decrease further bringing the danger of closure to another village school.
In spite of such small numbers,the parents work together to ensure that the children are not disadvantaged through lack of funds.
Two{teachers}are employed here,one full-time and the other part-time because the pupils are so few in number.
